de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer

Class AgdxmlLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer.AgdxLayer
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer.MenuLayer
        • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer.AgdxmlLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, MenuOwner

    public abstract class AgdxmlLayer
extends MenuLayer
    A MenuLayer that loads the format from an AGDXML file Can dynamically react on resize Events an different screen sizes

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAgdxmlGuiTextureProvider(java.lang.String key, GUITextureProvider value)
      add a GUITextureProvider to the map (can be access with the AGDXML-property [textures] )
      void addAgdxmlImageTexture(java.lang.String key, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion value)
      Add a Texture to the map (for <image> elements) (can can be acessed with the AGDXML-property [texture])
      void addAgdxmlImageTexture(java.lang.String key, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] value)
      Add a Texture to the map (for <image> elements) (can can be accessed with the AGDXML-property [texture]) (this is the method needed for animated image tags - because you can supply multiple frames)
      AgdxmlLayerBoundaryElement getBoundaryRootElement()
      get the boundary root element of the boundary tree in this all relative size information are stores
      abstract void initialize()
      Is called before the AGDXML file is parsed you can use this method to initialize the different maps
      void loadGuiTextureProviderFromTextureDefinition(AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader loader)
      Load the AgdxmlGuiTextureprovider via a TextureDefinition file (and the AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader class)

      Load the AgdxmlGuiTextureprovider via a TextureDefinition file (and the AgdxTextureDefinitionLoader class)
      void onActivate()
      Called when this layer becomes the active layer (override if this event is needed)
      void onResize()
      Gets called when the screen is resized (mostly on desktop)

      • AgdxmlLayer

        public AgdxmlLayer(AgdxGame owner,
           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont bmpfont,
           com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle agdxmlFile)
            throws AgdxmlParsingException
        Create a new AgdxmlLayer
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of the layer
        bmpfont - The standard font to use
        agdxmlFile - the file with the AGDXML description
        Throws:
        AgdxmlParsingException - if the agdxmlFile has Errors

      • AgdxmlLayer

            throws AgdxmlParsingException
        Creates a new AgdxmlLayer
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of the layer
        bmpfont - The standard font to use
        agdxmlFileContent - an XML file content with the AGDXML description
        Throws:
        AgdxmlParsingException - if the agdxmlFile has Errors
